articles.title: Latent Tuberculosis: Symptoms, diagnosis, and prevention measures - India TV News
articles.description: Latent TB is a condition where the TB bacteria remain in the body without causing any symptoms of the disease. However, the bacteria may become active later and cause TB disease if left untreated.
